title: AI Resume Job Matcher
description: Intelligent resume analysis tool using OpenAI API to provide personalized job matching and improvement suggestions
longDescription: A mobile-responsive web application that leverages OpenAI's natural language processing capabilities to analyze resumes and provide tailored improvement suggestions. Built with microservices architecture principles for scalability and optimized performance with secure data handling.

title: Information Crawler and Search Engine
description: CLI-based search engine with custom web crawling, smart indexing, and lightning-fast search across large datasets
longDescription: A sophisticated command-line search engine featuring custom web crawling capabilities, intelligent indexing algorithms, and optimized search functionality. Built to handle large-scale datasets efficiently using advanced Python libraries and NoSQL database architecture.

title: Crochet Counter App
description: Cross-platform mobile app for tracking crochet patterns and projects with intuitive pattern management
longDescription: A Flutter-based mobile application designed to help crochet enthusiasts track their patterns and projects. Features component-based architecture with reusable widgets, efficient state management, and local data persistence for offline-first functionality.
